name: ZDOC!
description:
CONTROLS
  • WASD: Move
  • Arrow Keys: Heal
  • Spacebar: Shoot
  • Refresh page to play again
  • Survive 5 waves to win!

Decades ago, before this all started, you made a promise- you swore a goddamn oath- to do no harm. These days, things are different. A virus has burrowed its way into every city, every town on the planet. People roam the streets, mindless. Hungry. It's dangerous out there.

But you swore an oath.

-

A game made in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022! The theme was 'Heal'.

  • Programming — Juggernaut04 and marigold 
  • Design — Juggernaut04 and marigold
  • Art — marigold
  • Sound — John Cage
